mdRecord.dcterms:description: Encouraging note addressed directly to future readers, with responses in previous two images in series, a response in this image, and one in the following as well. Note the similarity in structure/arrangement between this graffiti and that in image 4 of this series. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
Dear future UVa students who seek hope within the premises of your seat, Good luck. You are going to need it. Sincerely, Concerned citizen | â†‘ THX DU
